text: Ru moparegama kinama huta mani'nesafintira, kegavama huramante'nea ne'mo'a tamaza huno kinafintira anafe huno tamavre atiraminigeta, ha' vahe'mokizmi kuma'mofo kafaramimpintira etiramita egahaze. Tamagri kini ne' Ra Anumzamo agra'a ugota huramanteno nevuno, kegava huramanteno tamavreno vugahie.
